title: LANflix
tagline: Local-only streaming with a built-in server and LAN discovery.
description: Android app that runs in two modes: Server hosts a local media folder over LAN with live indexing and cached metadata; Client discovers servers, opens the in-app library UI, and streams via Media3 with resume history. Everything stays on your local network with optional PIN protection.
highlights: Server mode with live indexing, metadata cache, and optional PIN
Client discovery via LAN health checks and strict host enforcement
Media3 playback with resume history and retention settings
